Sushi Bake

Ingredients

  • 2 cups rice (preferably sushi)
  • 2 salmon fillets
  • some olive oil
  • some curry powder
  • some garlic powder
  • some salt bake
  • 1 pound imitation crab
  • 8 ounces cream cheese (softened)
  • 0.5 cup mayo
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 0.5 teaspoon salt
  • 0.25 teaspoon pepper
  • 2 tablespoons rice vinegar
  • some green onion
  • some sliced cucumber
  • some sriricha
  • some furikake

Cookware

  • 1 casserole dish

Steps

  1. preheat oven to 475 degrees

  2. cook rice (preferably sushi) according to package instructions

  3. while the rice is cooking, season salmon fillets with olive oil, curry powder, garlic powder, and salt bake the salmon in the oven for . Remove from oven and reduce oven temp to 350

  4. add salmon, shredded imitation crab, cream cheese (softened), mayo, garlic powder, salt, and pepper

  5. shred the salmon with a fork or your hands, and mix everything together thoroughly.

  6. When the rice is done, put it into a casserole dish and shake rice vinegar over it. mix and spread to fill the bottom of the dish

  7. top the rice with the salmon + crab mixture, and bake for

  8. cut the casserole into slices and serve topped with green onion, sliced cucumber, sriricha, and furikake
